list.name: Changes
list.comment: Use `asyncio.run` and let it automatically handle the event loop instead of manually handling a loop

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

task.summary: Replace `Path.replace` usage for zip file as-well.
Improve error handling in case subtitles fail to download
Change 'get_media_playlists' to a conventional function instead of a generator
Change 'get_media_playlists' to a conventional function instead of a generator

MESSAGE.value: Add matching subtitles count debug log
Fix ZIP & temp-directory names for downloaded episodes
Fix `main_playlist` being passed as valid when it's `None`, and improve error logs
Remove irrelevant code removing warnings in case verify-ssl is set to false
Restructure `__main__` and move functions to other modules
Remove Python 3.8 support and update dependencies
Update config logic to utilize Pydantic instead of custom code
Use `asyncio.run` and let it automatically handle the event loop instead of manually handling a loop

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Use `asyncio.run` and let it automatically handle the event loop instead of manually handling a loop
